summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2554, for the improvement of 14th Avenue Northeast from East 50th Street to Meadow Drive, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; providing for the necessary surface drainage; and that such other work be done as may be necessary in connection therewith, under Ordinance No. 29641 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
